H0.text: Which English mechanical and civil engineer who died in 1859 was responsible for engineering the Great Western Railway and designing the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol . Robert Stephenson

H1.text: Which English mechanical and civil engineer who died in 1859 was responsible for engineering the Great Western Railway and designing the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol . Joseph Locke

H2.text: Which English mechanical and civil engineer who died in 1859 was responsible for engineering the Great Western Railway and designing the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol . George Stephenson

H3.text: Which English mechanical and civil engineer who died in 1859 was responsible for engineering the Great Western Railway and designing the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol . Brunel

A4.text: Brunel built the Great Western Railway (GWR)

A5.text: Brunel is perhaps best remembered for designs for the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol
